mapper.select: SELECT group_code_id as groupCodeId ,group_name as groupName FROM isaver.group_code ORDER BY GROUP_CODE_ID;

SELECT a.group_code_id as groupCodeId ,a.group_name as groupName ,a.insert_user_id as insertUserId ,a.insert_datetime as insertDatetime ,a.update_user_id as updateUserId ,a.update_datetime as updateDatetime ,(SELECT user_name FROM isaver.users b WHERE b.user_id = a.insert_user_id) as insertUserName ,(SELECT user_name FROM isaver.users b WHERE b.user_id = a.update_user_id) as updateUserName FROM isaver.group_code a WHERE a.group_code_id=#{groupCodeId}
